params.vault: the vault of which the price is to be quoted

returns._0: the USD price of the vault token

getPoolTokenPriceUSD(address,(address,bo.notice: returns the price of the underlying pool token (e.g. BPT token) rather than the price of the vault token itself

getPriceUSD(address,(address,bool,uint25.notice: Quotes the USD price of `vault` tokens The quoted price is always scaled with 18 decimals regardless of the source used for the oracle.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct DataTypes.PricedToken memory[] memory) pure returns (uint256[] memory)
